be.ac.kuleuven.cs.ips2.project2002.logicCircuits
Interface ValueChangedListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface ValueChangedListener
extends java.util.EventListener

ValueChangedListener instances can be registered with a LogicCircuit. They will be notified when the boolean value (LogicCircuit.getValue()) of the logic circuit instance changes with a ValueChangedEvent.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Jan Dockx
